md:
giải nghĩa từ "orphans" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* orphan (noun) = trẻ mồ côi (a child who has no parents)

Example: The orphanage took care of many orphans who had lost their parents in the war.

* orphan (verb) = bỏ rơi, bỏ lại (to leave someone or something without support or care)

Example: The government was accused of orphaning the project after it had invested so much money.

* orphan (adjective) = không có cha mẹ, không có người chăm sóc (without parents or a guardian)

Example: The orphan boy had to live on the streets and fend for himself.

Related words:

* orphanage (noun) = trại trẻ mồ côi (a place where orphans are cared for)
* orphaned (verb) = bị bỏ rơi, bị bỏ lại (to be left without support or care)
* orphanhood (noun) = tình trạng trẻ mồ côi (the state of being an orphan)
html:
giải nghĩa từ "orphans" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • orphan (noun) = trẻ mồ côi (a child who has no parents)

Example: The orphanage took care of many orphans who had lost their parents in the war.

  • orphan (verb) = bỏ rơi, bỏ lại (to leave someone or something without support or care)

Example: The government was accused of orphaning the project after it had invested so much money.

  • orphan (adjective) = không có cha mẹ, không có người chăm sóc (without parents or a guardian)

Example: The orphan boy had to live on the streets and fend for himself.

Related words:

  • orphanage (noun) = trại trẻ mồ côi (a place where orphans are cared for)
  • orphaned (verb) = bị bỏ rơi, bị bỏ lại (to be left without support or care)
  • orphanhood (noun) = tình trạng trẻ mồ côi (the state of being an orphan)
